text: I'm looking for a HubSpot developer to help streamline some performance issues we have with our site. We need someone who is fluent in jquery, javascript hubl(obvs), HubDB and web best practices when it comes to site performance. I'd really like to be able to sit with this person for a day or two and go through some of the issues weve had to know how to change them for the future. Anyone able to help?

How to avoid data loss of custom modules while swiping blog template, see old template(first screenshot) which has one custom module name *blog header* and i have of live posts with data filled in that module, and now i want to swipe the template(second screenshot), but i am not able to retrieve the data of header module in new template after swapping the template

Hi - I’m brand-new to this Slack and I’ve been just starting to do some Dev work with HubSpot.

My first issue is this: I’m working with a HubSpot member who built pages about a year ago with a theme most of drag and drop templates. None of them are editable by code. Now, however, I do not seem to be able to add a new Drag and Drop template to a theme in my sandbox. It will only save in a folder or the root directory. In fact, there is only one place I even have the option to do a File, New and choose Drag and Drop template.  Are these being phased out? Is it best to use the HTML+HubL way? And, what do we do about the existing theme if we want to add templates?

Thank you!
